import { Avatar, IconButton } from '@material-ui/core'; import { AttachFile, MoreVert, SearchOutlined } from '@material-ui/icons'; import React from 'react'; import InsertEmoticonIcon from "@material-ui/icons/InsertEmoticon"; import "./Chat.css"; import MicIcon from "@material-ui/icons/Mic" function Chat({messages}) { return (

Room name

room info last seen..

{messages.map((message)=>{

{message.name} {message.message} {message.timestamp}

})}

sonny this is a message {new Date().toUTCString()}

) } export default Chat
